page.title: 07Houses in Durris
page.content: In our block the style of housing varies a lot. The old buildings are different from the modern houses in style and materials. There are quite a few farms in the block and some of them have been partly knocked down and rebuilt into a more modern style. Older buildings are made from grey or red granite with slate roofs.The newer houses are bungalows and the older buildings have mostly two stories. Most of the roofs of the new houses have red or grey tiles instead of slates .In the block there are quite a few ruined buildings,including farmhouses and mills.New houses here are very expensive.In Woodlands Park the houses can cost more than Â£100,000.They were built in 1976.There are twelve houses beside our school which were built around the same time.One of them cost Â£70,000.
